languages.text: "Есть и другой вариант. Дитя машины и темного света, что ты забрал{mf||а} с Кьява Гамма. Нам будет сладостно отправиться в недра корабля, где заточена его ярость, и вырвать его бушующую сущность, дабы подчинить себе стальную оболочку".

"There is another option. The scion of machine and the dark light. The one you took from Kiava Gamma. It would be a pleasure for us to go into the bowels of the ship where its anger is imprisoned and rip out its raging essence to subjugate its steel shell."
languages.original_text: "Есть и другой вариант. Дитя машины и темного света, что ты забрал{mf||а} с Кьява Гамма. Нам будет сладостно отправиться в недра корабля, где заточена его ярость, и вырвать его бушующую сущность, дабы подчинить себе стальную оболочку".

traits.locale_text: "There is another option. The scion of machine and the dark light. The one you took from Kiava Gamma. It would be a pleasure for us to go into the bowels of the ship where its anger is imprisoned and rip out its raging essence to subjugate its steel shell."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

traits.locale_text: "There is another option. The scion of machine and the dark light. The one you took from Kiava Gamma. We would savour dominating its rage and making it our shell."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

traits.locale_text: "There is another option. The scion of machine and the dark light. The one you took from Kiava Gamma. It would be a pleasure for us to go into the bowels of the ship where its anger is imprisoned and rip out its raging essence to subjugate its steel shell."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

traits.locale_text: "There is another option. The scion of machine and the dark light. The one you took from Kiava Gamma. We would savour dominating its rage and making it our shell."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

traits.locale_text: "There is another option. The scion of machine and the dark light. The one you took from Kiava Gamma. It would be a pleasure for us to go into the bowels of the ship where its anger is imprisoned and rip out its raging essence to subjugate its steel shell."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

traits.locale_text: "There is another option. The scion of machine and the dark light. The one you took from Kiava Gamma. It would be a pleasure for us to go into the bowels of the ship where its anger is imprisoned and rip out its raging essence to subjugate its steel shell."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: 「もう一つの選択肢がある。機械と昏き光の末裔だ。あなたがキアヴァ・ガンマから奪ったものだ。その怒りが封じ込められている船底に潜入し、その荒れ狂うエッセンスを引き出して、鋼鉄の殻を服従させるのは、我々にとって喜ばしいことだ」
languages.original_text: "There is another option. The scion of machine and the dark light. The one you took from Kiava Gamma. It would be a pleasure for us to go into the bowels of the ship where its anger is imprisoned and rip out its raging essence to subjugate its steel shell."

traits.locale_text: 「もう一つの選択肢がある。機械と昏き光の末裔だ。あなたがキアヴァ・ガンマから奪ったものだ。その怒りが封じ込められている船底に潜入し、その荒れ狂うエッセンスを引き出して、鋼鉄の殻を服従させるのは、我々にとって喜ばしいことだ」
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: “还有另一个选择，那就是机器与黑暗之光的子嗣，也就是你在基亚瓦伽马星缴获的东西。我们愿意前往这艘船的深处，撕裂它充满愤怒的精魂，征服它的钢铁之躯。”
languages.original_text: "There is another option. The scion of machine and the dark light. The one you took from Kiava Gamma. It would be a pleasure for us to go into the bowels of the ship where its anger is imprisoned and rip out its raging essence to subjugate its steel shell."

traits.locale_text: “还有另一个选择，那就是机器与黑暗之光的子嗣，也就是你在基亚瓦伽马星缴获的东西。我们愿意前往这艘船的深处，撕裂它充满愤怒的精魂，征服它的钢铁之躯。”
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: "Es gibt noch eine Option. Der Spross der Maschine und des dunklen Lichts. Der, den Ihr von Kiava Gamma mitgenommen habt. Es wäre uns ein Vergnügen, in die Eingeweide des Schiffes vorzudringen, in denen sein Zorn gefangen ist, um seine wütende Essenz herauszureißen und seine stählerne Hülle zu unterwerfen."
languages.original_text: "There is another option. The scion of machine and the dark light. The one you took from Kiava Gamma. It would be a pleasure for us to go into the bowels of the ship where its anger is imprisoned and rip out its raging essence to subjugate its steel shell."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt noch eine Option. Der Spross der Maschine und des dunklen Lichts. Der, den Ihr von Kiava Gamma mitgenommen habt. Wir würden es genießen, seine Wut zu dominieren und ihn zu unserer Hülle zu machen."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: « Il existe une autre solution. La progéniture de la machine et de la lumière noire que vous avez prise à Kiava Gamma. Nous nous ferions un plaisir de nous rendre dans les entrailles du vaisseau qui renferme sa colère et d'en arracher son essence pour soumettre son enveloppe d'acier. »
languages.original_text: "There is another option. The scion of machine and the dark light. The one you took from Kiava Gamma. It would be a pleasure for us to go into the bowels of the ship where its anger is imprisoned and rip out its raging essence to subjugate its steel shell."

traits.locale_text: « Il existe une autre solution. La progéniture de la machine et de la lumière noire que vous avez prise à Kiava Gamma. Nous nous ferions un plaisir de nous rendre dans les entrailles du vaisseau qui renferme sa colère et d'en arracher son essence pour soumettre son enveloppe d'acier. »
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: «Hay otra opción, nacida de la máquina y la luz oscura. La que sacó de Kiava Gamma. Sería un placer acudir a las entrañas de la nave, donde está encerrada su furia, y arrancar su iracunda esencia para subyugar su armazón de acero».
languages.original_text: "There is another option. The scion of machine and the dark light. The one you took from Kiava Gamma. It would be a pleasure for us to go into the bowels of the ship where its anger is imprisoned and rip out its raging essence to subjugate its steel shell."

traits.locale_text: «Hay otra opción, nacida de la máquina y la luz oscura. La que sacó de Kiava Gamma. Sería un placer acudir a las entrañas de la nave, donde está encerrada su furia, y arrancar su iracunda esencia para subyugar su armazón de acero».
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: "Bir seçenek daha var. Makinenin ve kara ışığın soyu... Kiava Gama'dan aldığınız şeyin ta kendisi. Öfkesinin muhafaza edildiği yere... Yani geminin derinliklerine inip hiddetli özütünü söküp aldıktan sonra çelik kabuğunu zapt etmek, bizim için büyük bir zevk olurdu."
languages.original_text: "There is another option. The scion of machine and the dark light. The one you took from Kiava Gamma. It would be a pleasure for us to go into the bowels of the ship where its anger is imprisoned and rip out its raging essence to subjugate its steel shell."

traits.locale_text: "Başka bir seçenek daha var. Makinenin ve kara ışığın soyu... Kiava Gama'dan aldığınız şeyin ta kendisi. Öfkesinin muhafaza edildiği yere... Yani geminin derinliklerine gidip hiddetli özütünü söküp aldıktan sonra çelik kabuğunu zapt etmek, bizim için büyük bir zevk olurdu."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine
